name: Weightless (noaner)
description:
A minimalist game, built to calm.

Use the arrow keys to accelerate your circle, in a world full of other circles.

Gravity pulls them together, but you alone have the power to invert gravity with the spacebar, forcing objects to repel each other instead.

Touch another circle to absorb its mass. Absorb several circles of the same color to advance to the next level. Realize that the more mass you have, the less control you have over your movement and the more gravitational attraction you exert.
